001package com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.util;
002
003import cloud.commandframework.ArgumentDescription;
004import cloud.commandframework.arguments.CommandArgument;
005import cloud.commandframework.arguments.parser.ArgumentParseResult;
006import cloud.commandframework.arguments.parser.ArgumentParser;
007import cloud.commandframework.captions.Caption;
008import cloud.commandframework.captions.CaptionVariable;
009import cloud.commandframework.context.CommandContext;
010import cloud.commandframework.exceptions.parsing.NoInputProvidedException;
011import cloud.commandframework.exceptions.parsing.ParserException;
012import net.kyori.adventure.key.Key;
013
014import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
015
016import javax.annotation.Nullable;
017
018import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.DemeterPlugin;
019import com.github.aecsocket.demeter.paper.feature.Seasons;
020
021import java.util.ArrayList;
022import java.util.List;
023import java.util.Queue;
024import java.util.function.BiFunction;
025
026/**
027 * Command argument which parses a {@link Seasons.Season}.
028 * @param <C> The command sender type.
029 */
030public final class SeasonArgument<C> extends CommandArgument<C, Seasons.Season> {
031    /** When a season cannot be parsed. */
032    public static final Caption ARGUMENT_PARSE_FAILURE_SEASON = Caption.of("argument.parse.failure.season");
033
034    private final DemeterPlugin plugin;
035
036    private SeasonArgument(
037            final DemeterPlugin plugin,
038            final boolean required,
039            final @NonNull String name,
040            final @NonNull String defaultValue,
041            final @Nullable BiFunction<@NonNull CommandContext<C>,
042                    @NonNull String, @NonNull List<@NonNull String>> suggestionsProvider,
043            final @NonNull ArgumentDescription defaultDescription
044    ) {
045        super(required, name, new SeasonParser<>(plugin), defaultValue, Seasons.Season.class, suggestionsProvider, defaultDescription);
046        this.plugin = plugin;
047    }
048
049    /**
050     * Create a new builder
051     *
052     * @param plugin Plugin
053     * @param name   Name of the component
054     * @param <C>    Command sender type
055     * @return Created builder
056     */
057    public static <C> @NonNull Builder<C> newBuilder(final DemeterPlugin plugin, final @NonNull String name) {
058        return new Builder<>(plugin, name);
059    }
060
061    /**
062     * Create a new required command component
063     *
064     * @param plugin Plugin
065     * @param name   Component name
066     * @param <C>    Command sender type
067     * @return Created component
068     */
069    public static <C> @NonNull CommandArgument<C, Seasons.Season> of(final DemeterPlugin plugin, final @NonNull String name) {
070        return SeasonArgument.<C>newBuilder(plugin, name).asRequired().build();
071    }
072
073    /**
074     * Create a new optional command component
075     *
076     * @param plugin Plugin
077     * @param name   Component name
078     * @param <C>    Command sender type
079     * @return Created component
080     */
081    public static <C> @NonNull CommandArgument<C, Seasons.Season> optional(final DemeterPlugin plugin, final @NonNull String name) {
082        return SeasonArgument.<C>newBuilder(plugin, name).asOptional().build();
083    }
084
085    /**
086     * Create a new required command component with a default value
087     *
088     * @param plugin       Plugin
089     * @param name         Component name
090     * @param defaultValue Default value
091     * @param <C>          Command sender type
092     * @return Created component
093     */
094    public static <C> @NonNull CommandArgument<C, Seasons.Season> optional(
095            final DemeterPlugin plugin,
096            final @NonNull String name,
097            final @NonNull Key defaultValue
098    ) {
099        return SeasonArgument.<C>newBuilder(plugin, name).asOptionalWithDefault(defaultValue.toString()).build();
100    }
101
102
103    public static final class Builder<C> extends CommandArgument.Builder<C, Seasons.Season> {
104        private final DemeterPlugin plugin;
105
106        private Builder(final DemeterPlugin plugin, final @NonNull String name) {
107            super(Seasons.Season.class, name);
108            this.plugin = plugin;
109        }
110
111        /**
112         * Builder a new example component
113         *
114         * @return Constructed component
115         */
116        @Override
117        public @NonNull SeasonArgument<C> build() {
118            return new SeasonArgument<>(
119                    plugin,
120                    this.isRequired(),
121                    this.getName(),
122                    this.getDefaultValue(),
123                    this.getSuggestionsProvider(),
124                    this.getDefaultDescription()
125            );
126        }
127
128    }
129
130    public static final class SeasonParser<C> implements ArgumentParser<C, Seasons.Season> {
131        private final DemeterPlugin plugin;
132
133        public SeasonParser(DemeterPlugin plugin) {
134            this.plugin = plugin;
135        }
136
137        @Override
138        public @NonNull ArgumentParseResult<Seasons.Season> parse(
139                final @NonNull CommandContext<C> ctx,
140                final @NonNull Queue<@NonNull String> inputQueue
141        ) {
142            //noinspection PatternValidation
143            final String input = inputQueue.peek();
144            if (input == null) {
145                return ArgumentParseResult.failure(new NoInputProvidedException(
146                        Key.class,
147                        ctx
148                ));
149            }
150            inputQueue.remove();
151
152            Seasons.Season season = plugin.seasons().config().seasons.get(input);
153            if (season == null)
154                return ArgumentParseResult.failure(new ParseException(input, ctx));
155            return ArgumentParseResult.success(season);
156        }
157
158        @Override
159        public boolean isContextFree() {
160            return true;
161        }
162
163        @Override
164        public @NonNull List<@NonNull String> suggestions(@NonNull CommandContext<C> ctx, @NonNull String input) {
165            return new ArrayList<>(plugin.seasons().config().seasons.keySet());
166        }
167    }
168
169    public static final class ParseException extends ParserException {
170        public ParseException(String input, CommandContext<?> ctx) {
171            super(Seasons.Season.class, ctx, ARGUMENT_PARSE_FAILURE_SEASON,
172                    CaptionVariable.of("input", input));
173        }
174    }
175}
